definition: long and slender with a very small internal diameter, a tube of small internal diameter
details:
adjective
- long and slender with a very small internal diameter
= example: long and slender with a very small internal diameter
= synonyms: hairlike
- of or relating to hair
noun
- a tube of small internal diameter
= example: a tube of small internal diameter
= synonyms: capillary tube, capillary tubing
- any of the minute blood vessels connecting arterioles with venules
= synonyms: capillary vessel
